entry.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 9.4

link.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 9.4

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Marathi Letters, from Divine Message Version 9.4 we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 9.3 was posted on January 21, 2024. The pdf file with 3 full new translations into English is available at the link Version 9.4.
Total Marathi Letters: 38 (increased by 1 as a retyped letter with PS has been identified as 2 retyped letters).
Originals: 25.75 letters.
Retyped or (original) rewritten text: 5.25 letters.
Translations: 35.16 letters (increased by 3).
Translations withouts original or retyped or (original) rewriting: 7.
Versions: almost 4.
Pages pdf file: 133 pages (increased by 2).

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Marathi Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Divine Message, Version 9.3
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Database of Transcripts/Quotes we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 9.2 was posted on November 19, 2023. The pdf file Divine Message, Version 9.3 is available at the link Version 9.3.

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

For older versions of Divine Message and of other databases, please see Version 9.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Comprehensive Compilations Team (the Divine Message Subteam)

entry.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 9.1

link.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 9.1

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Marathi Letters, from Divine Message Version 9.1 we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 9 was posted on July 30, 2023. The pdf file with a half new original but with full new translation and with 2 new letters translated into English and with an additional version translation into English is available at the link Version 9.1.
Total Marathi Letters: 38 (increased by 1).
Originals: 27.5 letters (increased by 0.5). [Missing originals but with retyped text: 2 letters.]
Translations: 28.16 letters (increased by 3).
Pages pdf file: 131 pages.

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Marathi Subteam
